function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglect of germicidal irradiation in building operations","Impact":"Failure to effectively reduce SARS-CoV-2 risk in buildings","Mitigation":"Integrate the use of germicidal irradiation into building operational measures","Technologies":"Germicidal UV irradiation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management and building operations teams"},{"Description":"Limited use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in controlling airborne virus transmission","Mitigation":"Expand the use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","Technologies":"Germicidal UV irradiation systems","People":"General public and building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate knowledge of germicidal irradiation extent in Slovakia","Impact":"Risk of inefficient virus control in buildings","Mitigation":"Conduct research to assess the current use of germicidal irradiation in Slovakia","Technologies":"Research and monitoring tools","People":"Public health authorities and researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies and research institutions"}]}
